bank_intro.speaker: Narrator
bank_intro.text: Neon rain soaks New Horizon. Outside First National Bank, your crew waits in the shadows.

vault_path.speaker: Vincent
vault_path.text: No mistakes. Rachel on the vault, Elaria on cams. We’re in and out.

roof_path.speaker: Elaria
roof_path.text: Roof access secured. Vents hum—guards rotate every ninety seconds.

alarm_path.speaker: Narrator
alarm_path.text: Kick the door. Sirens scream. Security drones wake.

cam_room.speaker: Elaria
cam_room.text: Camera hub found. One guard inside, half-asleep.

vault_open.speaker: Rachel
vault_open.text: Tumblers sing. The vault yawns open—rows of safety boxes, and a sealed case marked SIGMA.

vent_crawl.speaker: Narrator
vent_crawl.text: Tight vents. Voices below. You reach a grate above the vault corridor.

skylight.speaker: Narrator
skylight.text: Glass gives with a whisper. You land in the lobby. Two guards at the far desk.

drone_fight.speaker: Milo
drone_fight.text: Drones swarm. Sparks and smoke. You clear them—but dispatch is alerted.

alley_escape.speaker: Darius
alley_escape.text: Engine idles in the alley. Police chatter spikes on the radio.

cams_down.speaker: Elaria
cams_down.text: Cameras offline. Windows of darkness open across the bank.

choices.label: Flash a fake and talk fast

hallway.speaker: Narrator
hallway.text: Quiet corridor to the vault. Motion sensors blink.

artifact_taken.speaker: Rachel
artifact_taken.text: The SIGMA case is warm to the touch. Inside: a palm-sized prism pulsing with violet light.

decoy.speaker: Vincent
decoy.text: Decoy planted. Let them chase a ghost. Time to vanish.

dock_exit.speaker: Narrator
dock_exit.text: Loading bay. Rain pours through the half-open door. A patrol turns the corner.

escape_sewer.speaker: Narrator
escape_sewer.text: You descend into the city’s veins. Water roars. Something hums ahead—an impossible light.

blocked_tunnel.speaker: Milo
blocked_tunnel.text: Cave-in blocks the path. The hum behind you intensifies.

portal_discovery.speaker: Narrator
portal_discovery.text: A violet whirlpool of air and light spins above the water—silent, weightless, wrong. It pulls at the prism.

choices.label: Throw the prism in and run

portal_backlash.speaker: Narrator
portal_backlash.text: The prism vanishes. A shockwave slams the tunnel; walls crack; water surges.

fail_escape.speaker: Narrator
fail_escape.text: The tunnel gives way. In the chaos you’re swept toward the light.

portal_enter.speaker: Narrator
portal_enter.text: Cold. Weightless. A bell rings somewhere beyond sight. New air fills your lungs.
